title: The Githyanki Warrior
content:
hyanki sentries directed us to the infirmary. We should take Lae'zel there: the cure to our tadpole awaits us.

Speak to the doctor of the creche.

We have found the creche infirmary. We should speak to Ghustil Stornugoss about a cure.

Sit in the zaith'isk.

We told Ghustil Stornugoss about the parasites, and she's willing to help us. But first, we must sit in the zaith'isk.

Speak to Lae'zel about the incident with the zaith'isk.

Instead of extracting Lae'zel's tadpole, the zaith'isk nearly k
